From: "Craig Duncan" <leftymiata@...>
> This xml file that I am trying to use is only needed for unit tests,
> it is not needed in the final production code, therefore I originally
> just put the file into a jar that contains a bunch of ".java" files.
> Basically a jar of the source that developers can use as reference.  I
> ended up moving it into the jar that contains the ".class" files.  One
> of those ".class" files is the Deal class.
>

It works in eclipse because eclipse "builds" non java files by copying them
to the equivalent location in the output path.

- Neil
